channel.title: Diego Auza | Software Engineer | Entrepreneur
channel.description: Recent content on Diego Auza | Software Engineer | Entrepreneur

item.title: About
item.description: I am a mobile developer interested in getting things done, providing the user and client a nice experience, that’s why I have fundamentals on UI/UX design as well. I am mostly self-taught and i have more that 6 years of experience in iOS development. For many years i’ve been managing developers and designers for a software development side-business. Most of the time I am working in iOS, but I develop for Android and Ruby on Rails too.
